question.body: Which of the following would be involved in a somatic reflex arc but not a visceral autonomic reflex arc?

multiple_choice.choice: efferent motor neuron to skeletal muscle
efferent motor neuron to smooth muscle

response.feedback: Incorrect. This is involved in both somatic and visceral reflex arcs.
Incorrect. This is involved in both somatic and visceral reflex arcs.
Incorrect. This is involved in both somatic and visceral reflex arcs.
Correct. Only the somatic reflex arc will stimulate a skeletal muscle as the effector; a visceral reflex arc involves stimulating smooth muscle or glands as the effectors.
Incorrect. The visceral reflex arc does involve stimulating smooth muscle (or glands or cardiac muscle).

part.hint: Review the type of effectors and motor pathway for visceral reflex arc.
